snippet.title: Golden Axe: Beast Rider - trailer
snippet.description: In Golden Axe: Beast Rider, gamers take on the role of the unstoppable Tyris Flare, and engage in vicious melee combat both on foot and atop massive mythical beasts, savaging enemies with blades and magic on a quest for vengeance.

localized.title: Golden Axe: Beast Rider - trailer
localized.description: In Golden Axe: Beast Rider, gamers take on the role of the unstoppable Tyris Flare, and engage in vicious melee combat both on foot and atop massive mythical beasts, savaging enemies with blades and magic on a quest for vengeance.
